pack

Class ChatPanel

  • java.lang.Object
    • pack.ChatPanel

  • public class ChatPanel
extends Object
    ChatPanel is the backend implementation of a ChatPanelGUI that holds a number of clients (ClientThreads) and all in all represents a single chat. On creation of a ChatPanel, it will automatically create a ChatPanelGUI connected with it. Then ClientThreads can be connected to the chat by passing on a ChatPanel object on ClientThread creation.
    Author:
    anton

        public void addClientThread(ClientThread thread)

        Parameters:
        thread - - The thread to be added

      • onConnect

        private void onConnect()
        Update function that is called whenever a client connects

      • onDisconnect

        public void onDisconnect()
        Called on any type of disconnect happening withing the chat. If there are no clients left, then the chat closes.

      • onDisconnectAll

        public void onDisconnectAll()
        Called on disconnecting all from chat. If there are no clients left, then the chat closes.

      • onNameUpdate

        public void onNameUpdate()
        Called whenever an associated ClientThread gets an updated display name

        public void removeAllClientThreads()
        Remove all connected clientthreads

      • removeClientThread

        public void removeClientThread(ClientThread thread)
        Removes a ClientThread from the chatpanel. Should only be called from the internal functions of ClientThread.
        Parameters:
        thread - - The thread to remove

      • sendMessageToAllButOne

        public void sendMessageToAllButOne(String clientID,
                                   Message message)
        Sends a message to all but one client (for the pourpose when a client sends the server a message to be relayed)
        Parameters:
        clientName - - The client the msg shouldn't be sent to
        message - - The message to be sent
